returns.conflictId: The generated conflict ID, or bytes32(0) if no conflict.

params.policyOverride: Optional policy ID to use (bytes32(0) to skip).

returns.resolved: Whether the conflict was automatically resolved.

detect(bytes,bytes,bytes,string).notice: Detect whether a conflict exists between two versions of a base.

manualResolve(bytes32,bytes).notice: Manually resolve a conflict with a chosen resolution.

resolve(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Attempt automatic resolution of a conflict using the given policy.
